tier.item: objects in Xhosa, the interrogative word has to appear immediately adjacent to the verb. (44b) Lorato o apeela MO JARATENG
In such cases the verb must always have objectival agreement through a clitic with the 1.Lorato S3:1-cook-APPL-FIN PREP 9.yard-LOC
object because the object is never adjacent to verbs in questions' (du Plessis and Visser `Lorato does the cooking IN THE YARD'
